headline: Lumana Surpasses 50,000 Cameras, Cementing Its Leadership in AI Video Surveillance
summary: Lumana, the leader in AI video surveillance, today announced that it has surpassed 50,000 cameras. This milestone reinforces Lumana's rapid expansion and solidifies its position as the fastest-growing AI security company in a market shifting from reactive monitoring to proactive, real-time intelligence.

raw.headline: Lumana Surpasses 50,000 Cameras, Cementing Its Leadership in AI Video Surveillance
raw.summary: Lumana, the leader in AI video surveillance, today announced that it has surpassed 50,000 cameras. headline: McDonald’s Is Watching Prices Closely, It Tells Franchisees
summary: McDonald’s has a message for franchisees: Do more to keep meals affordable.  It will also ensure operators meet service and quality standards.  “While the U.S. has a proud legacy of delivering value to our customers, we still have opportunity to deliver more,” Mason Smoot, chief restaurant officer for McDonald’s U.S., said in a Monday message to operators.

raw.headline: McDonald’s Is Watching Prices Closely, It Tells Franchisees

It will also ensure operators meet service and quality standards.  “While the U.S. has a proud legacy of delivering value to our customers, we still have opportunity to deliver more,” Mason Smoot, chief restaurant officer for McDonald’s U.S., said in a Monday message to operators.

headline: McDonald’s will assess if franchisees are offering value for customers under new standards
summary: McDonald's has leaned into value to appeal to cash-strapped diners who have been visiting its restaurants less frequently.

raw.headline: McDonald’s will assess if franchisees are offering value for customers under new standards
raw.summary: McDonald's has leaned into value to appeal to cash-strapped diners who have been visiting its restaurants less frequently.

headline: Allison Worldwide Expands Global Leadership with New Europe CEO
summary: Allison Worldwide, part of Stagwell (STGW), has announced the appointment of Jeremy Lucas as CEO, Europe.

headline: 1 Unpopular Stock That Deserves Some Love and 2 We Avoid
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.

headline: Forget menu prices, McDonald's quietly makes massive financial move
summary: A lot of attention has been focused on McDonald's seeing a change in its customer base. That's something CEO Christopher Kempczinski talked about extensively during the chain's third-quarter earnings call.
